statements: SELECT * FROM software_updates WHERE update_id = 1;
SELECT software_name, version FROM software_updates WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM software_updates WHERE software_name LIKE 'Microsoft%';
SELECT software_name, version, release_date FROM software_updates ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT software_name, version FROM software_updates WHERE patch_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT update_id, version FROM software_updates WHERE software_name = 'AppX' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM software_updates WHERE version LIKE '%.0%' OR patch_description LIKE '%security%' ORDER BY update_id ASC;
SELECT software_name, version, release_date FROM software_updates WHERE release_date >= '2021-01-01' AND version NOT LIKE '%beta%' ORDER BY release_date DESC, software_name;
SELECT software_name, patch_description FROM software_updates WHERE software_name IN ('AppA', 'AppB', 'AppC') AND LENGTH(patch_description) > 50 ORDER BY software_name ASC, update_id DESC;
SELECT software_name, version FROM software_updates WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND software_name NOT LIKE 'App%' ORDER BY version DESC;
SELECT * FROM software_updates;
SELECT software_name, version_number FROM software_updates ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT software_name, version_number FROM software_updates WHERE software_name='AppX';
SELECT software_name, version_number, release_date FROM software_updates ORDER BY version_number ASC;
SELECT patch_description FROM patches WHERE update_id=101;
SELECT software_name, version_number FROM software_updates
SELECT * FROM patches WHERE patch_version = '1.0'
SELECT software_name, release_date FROM software_updates ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM software_updates
SELECT software_name, version_number FROM software_updates WHERE software_name LIKE 'M%'
SELECT * FROM software_updates
SELECT software_name, version FROM software_updates WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT version, software_name, update_date FROM software_updates WHERE software_name = 'Application A'
SELECT system_name, status FROM system_status ORDER BY system_name ASC
SELECT patch_name, patch_date FROM patches ORDER BY patch_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT software_name, version FROM software_updates WHERE update_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patch_name, patch_date FROM patches WHERE patch_date BETWEEN '2021-02-01' AND '2021-03-01';
SELECT system_name, last_checked_date FROM system_status WHERE status = 'OK' ORDER BY last_checked_date DESC;
SELECT software_name, description FROM software_updates WHERE version LIKE '%beta%';
SELECT patch_name, patch_description, patch_date FROM patches WHERE patch_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT software_name, version FROM software_updates;
SELECT * FROM patches WHERE size_mb > 5;
SELECT system_name, os_version, last_checked FROM systems ORDER BY last_checked DESC;
SELECT patch_name, patch_date FROM patches WHERE patch_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT system_name, software_name, applied_date FROM systems JOIN system_updates ON systems.system_id = system_updates.system_id JOIN software_updates ON system_updates.update_id = software_updates.update_id;
SELECT * FROM software_updates ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT software_name, version FROM software_updates WHERE software_name = 'Microsoft Office';

SELECT s.system_name, su.applied_date, u.version FROM systems s INNER JOIN system_updates su ON s.system_id = su.system_id INNER JOIN software_updates u ON su.update_id = u.update_id ORDER BY su.applied_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT u.software_name, u.version, p.size_mb FROM software_updates u INNER JOIN patches p ON u.update_id = p.update_id WHERE p.size_mb > 100;
SELECT s.system_name, COUNT(su.system_id) AS update_count FROM systems s LEFT JOIN system_updates su ON s.system_id = su.system_id GROUP BY s.system_name HAVING COUNT(su.system_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM software_updates;
SELECT software_name, version FROM software_updates WHERE update_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patches ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, installation_date FROM systems WHERE system_id = 2;
SELECT system_software.system_id, system_software.software_name, software_updates.version FROM system_software JOIN software_updates ON system_software.software_name = software_updates.software_name;
SELECT software_name, version FROM software_updates;
SELECT system_name, installation_date FROM systems ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT software_name, patch_version, patch_date FROM patches WHERE patch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT systems.system_name, software_name, installed_version FROM systems JOIN system_software ON systems.system_id = system_software.system_id WHERE installed_version LIKE '%v1%';

SELECT system_name, software_name, patch_date FROM systems JOIN system_software ON systems.system_id = system_software.system_id JOIN system_patches ON systems.system_id = system_patches.system_id JOIN patches ON system_patches.patch_id = patches.patch_id WHERE patch_date < '2022-10-01' ORDER BY patch_date ASC;
